item.title: Blog Post: Reusable HTML
item.description: A little tutorial about web components.
item.author: nenrikido@pm.me (rio)

item.title: Code page update
item.description: Code page is up now! Still a bit sparse; hopefully this motivates me to fix up and re-release some old code. I'm thinking about making some stuff for Neocities (and perhaps Neopets?) too.
item.author: nenrikido@pm.me (rio)

item.title: New RSS feed
item.description: I've never tried making an RSS feed before, but I saw a few women with them online and thought I'd try it out! Let me know if anything is weird. Anyways, I'll use this to announce site updates alongside the index page's update section. Recent updates include a blog post about planning a website, a new site clock, an updated to-do list, some new sites in the cool sites section, updated counters, and a new webring!
item.author: nenrikido@pm.me (rio)
